CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 19, 1954, page 8, reads: "Thousands Attend Courier Home, Food Show...2. A part of the tremendous throng who sat through three nights of the Home Fair...Harris Photo"
TitMainTitle: Audience seated on folding chairs in Hunt Armory for the 1954 Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair
CatSubject_tab: Crowds--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Women--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Men--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Hunt Armory (Pittsburgh, Pa.)Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair.
